title: Electronic Design
description: Design of electronic systems and subsystems using analog and digital integrated circuits. Design principles and techniques. Analysis and design of feedback amplifiers; operational amplifier applications. Design of analog/digital and digital/analog converters. Power supply design. Emphasis on IC implementation. 3 lectures.
prerequisites: EE 308 & EE 348; CPE/EE 328 & CPE/EE 368; CPE/EE 329 or CPE/EE 336
